title: Checkout Error 500 on Mobile
resolution: Escalate to payments team; link incident INC-2023-09-10

title: Password Reset Link Expired
resolution: Ask user to clear cache and request a new link. If persists, check email latency.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
resolution: Check AWS Status page. Known latency in US-East-1. Advise user to retry in 10 mins.

title: Where to find VAT Invoices
resolution: Direct user to Settings -> Billing -> History. Attach 'How to download invoices' PDF.

title: API Rate Limit Exceeded
resolution: Explain tier limits. Suggest upgrading to Pro plan for higher throughput.

title: Android App Crash on Splash Screen
resolution: Known bug in v2.4. Ask user to update to v2.4.1 via Play Store.

title: Subscription Upgrade Failed
resolution: Check Stripe logs for decline reason. Usually insufficient funds or bank block.

title: Two-Factor Auth SMS not arriving
resolution: Verify phone number format. Suggest using Authenticator App instead of SMS.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
resolution: Tag as Feature Request. Inform user it is on roadmap for Q4.

title: Data Export CSV is Empty
resolution: Escalate to Data Engineering. Check queue worker logs.
